Reviews.Title: PHONE CARD
Reviews.Author: Angela
Reviews.Content: ABSOLUTELY LOVE THE FACT THAT I DONT HAVE TO FIGHT THE CROWDS AT LOCAL STORE JUST TO BUY A SINGLE CARD....WILL BE USING AGAIN MONTH AFTER MONTH

Reviews.Title: Not bad
Reviews.Author: Jeff Spieker
Reviews.Content: Its just what it says it is, saved me the trip to walmart so very convenient.  I got the refill very soon after the order and would probably  buy this again.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Henry Hannible
Reviews.Content: Had reservations about using this item via online. But, was surprisingly shocked when I was ableto get the confirmation and the product delivery wihtin the alloted time frame.This is definitely a diffenet approach for those who do not have the time or the resources to get a regular airtime card from a vendor.

Reviews.Title: Superb!!!
Reviews.Author: Bonnie Lou
Reviews.Content: This is my first time reloading our straight talk smart phones and I must say I'm loving it. I love the way it was handle ( just a matter of less than two hours I received my digital pin ). This is definitely the way to go. I would highly recommend doing business with this seller and will be doing so again.

Reviews.Title: Don't Buy It!
Reviews.Author: claudia
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone from walmart 3 months ago.  the phone isn't the best.  All the features are good except people can't hear me on it.  I tried calling customer service 5x.  Each time I talked to someone who had no idea about my prior calls.  I was on the phone with them for 3 hours.  I was so frustrated with them.  Every time they promised me the phone is now perfect, it wasn't.  Finally I realize I am just going to have to cancel.  I hate to do it but what is the point of having a phone I can't talk on?  I am willing to go with the contract phones.  At least I can go to the Verizon store and talk to someone face to face and they usually do a good job of fixing any problems I have.  Bad idea to buy this phone; i was trying to cut costs but ended up spending more.
